titleStmt.title: To His Excellency the Lord Fleetwood, and the general council of officers of the armies of England, Scotland, and Ireland. The humble address of the inferiour officers and souldiers of the late Lord Pride's regiment.

notesStmt.note: An address of loyalty to the Commonwealth and opposition to the Royalist cause -- Thomason Cat.
The verso of second leaf is numbered 1.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
